title: Competitive Player Looking For Oceanic Open Ladder Team

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Hello everyone,

My name is TKNS Penguin, I am a former member of the Knights, a semi-competitive team that competed in numerous online tournaments and ladders such as Cybergamer. I have a considerable amount of experience with playing as a team, and am looking for a committed team that wants to play in the upcoming Oceanic Open Ladder.

Some of my achievements in LoL:
1st Place OnevOneNZ Tournament (The Knights) 2015
1st Place Harrysurf 1v1 Howling Abyss Tournament (myself) 2013
2nd Place EdgeGaming 5v5 Tournament (Integral Gaming) 2013
2nd Place Harrysurf Summoners Rift Tournament (Integral Gaming) 2013
4th Place Poro League - Oceania (Integral Gaming) 2013
4th Place Vertex NZ Public 5v5 Tournament (The Knights) 2016
6th Place AU Cybergamer League of Legends Open Ladder (The Knights) 2015
8th Place OCL Sunday Weekly (Team Light Oceania) 2014

I play Top, Jungle and ADC. My strong champions in each role are:
Top: Malphite, Renekton, Darius, Shen, Gangplank
Jungle: Lee Sin, Kha'Zix, Rek'Sai
ADC: Lucian, Vayne, Caitlyn, Miss Fortune, Ezreal

Availability times include Friday & Saturday (time schedule is drastically restricted this year due to study commitments).
Looking for a team that is capable of exchanging banter with one another, yet maintains the lust to do well as a team and play well in the Oceanic Open Ladder. 
I can become a Top/Jg/ADC in the main roster, but I am also willing to sign up as a substitute.

Peak Rank: Platinum 1 (promotional series to Diamond)
Current Rank: Platinum 3 (placed in Platinum 5, climbing fast).

If you are interested, please reply below in the comments section or add me in game: TKNS Penguin. 
Thank you!
- TKNS Penguin{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
I would like to join with you in the ool this year.
Summoner name- The lion man 090
Email- bendw@outlook.com
My strong lanes are top, and jg.
